name: Switch-ing Seasons
description:
How to Win:

  • Collect all the wooden plates to open up the treehouse at the end of your journey!
  • You won't win if there are any missing plates.

Instructions:

  • SHIFT to switch to winter/spring
  • SPACE to jump
  • AD or left/right arrows to move

Team:

  • Omar Khashoggi, programmer
  • Atheer Al-Harbi, programmer
  • Mashael Al-Khalifah, artist
  • Raghad Redwan, designer

Credits:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/10-effects-colorful-fx-packa...
  • https://freesound.org/people/Nadia4Sound/sounds/424855/
  • https://freesound.org/people/UrsaDaBear/sounds/400992/
